content: git gud with this cute hornet amigurumi from the popular game hollow knight silksong in this fun and free crochet pattern her features include a crescent head with ears that looks a bit like a bunny she has a classic red dress she carries a needle sword which i ve just used my trusty yarn needle as a prop she s very fun to pose in some dynamic action shots she ll slash and dash her way into your heart ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **approximate size ** 7 5 in tall / 19cm tall including ears i d love to see how your hornet turns out tag me with your projects on my instagram @ami_amour 1 you can also crochet along with me on the hornet video tutorial 2 on my youtube channel ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **level ** intermediate **need to know ** single_crochet half_double_crochet increase decrease chain slip_stitch color change 1 https //www instagram com/ami_amour 2 https //youtu be/ioov14dlypc
